languages.text: Когда взрывы затихают и осколки астероидов, космического мусора и пустотных мин растворяются во тьме космоса, к чудом уцелевшему кораблю ксеносов отправляется спасательный отряд.
Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.
languages.original_text: Когда взрывы затихают и осколки астероидов, космического мусора и пустотных мин растворяются во тьме космоса, к чудом уцелевшему кораблю ксеносов отправляется спасательный отряд.

traits.locale_text: Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris and void mines dissolve in the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off to the miraculously intact xenoship.
Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris and void mines dissolve in the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off to the miraculously intact xenoship.
Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.
Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.
Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.

languages.text: 爆炸平息下来之后，小行星的碎片、太空垃圾与虚空雷都消失在了黑暗的虚空中。异形飞船奇迹般地没有受到任何伤害，救援队立刻开始进行救援工作。
languages.original_text: Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.

traits.locale_text: 爆炸平息下来之后，小行星的碎片、太空垃圾与虚空雷都消失在了黑暗的虚空中。异形飞船奇迹般地没有受到任何伤害，救援队立刻开始进行救援工作。

languages.text: 爆発が静まり、小惑星や宇宙ゴミ、ヴォイドマインの破片が虚空の闇に溶け込むと、救助隊は奇跡的に無傷だった異種族船に向かって出発する。
languages.original_text: Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.

traits.locale_text: 爆発が静まり、小惑星や宇宙ゴミ、ヴォイドマインの破片が虚空の闇に溶け込むと、救助隊は奇跡的に無傷だった異種族船に向かって出発する。

languages.text: Una vez que las explosiones cesan y los fragmentos de asteroides, desechos espaciales y minas de vacío se desvanecen en la oscuridad del vacío, un equipo de rescate parte hacia la nave xenos milagrosamente intacta.
languages.original_text: Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.

traits.locale_text: Una vez que las explosiones cesan y los fragmentos de asteroides, desechos espaciales y minas de vacío se desvanecen en la oscuridad del vacío, un equipo de rescate parte hacia la nave xenos milagrosamente intacta.

languages.text: Nachdem sich die Explosionen gelegt haben und sich die Splitter aus Asteroiden, Weltraumschutt und Unlichtminen in der Dunkelheit der Leere auflösen, bricht ein Rettungsteam zu dem Xenoschiff auf, das wie durch ein Wunder noch intakt ist.
languages.original_text: Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem sich die Explosionen gelegt haben und sich die Splitter aus Asteroiden, Weltraumschutt und Unlichtminen in der Dunkelheit der Leere auflösen, bricht ein Rettungsteam zu dem Xenoschiff auf, das wie durch ein Wunder noch intakt ist.

languages.text: Une fois la réaction en chaîne terminée et les fragments d'astéroïdes, de débris spatiaux et de mines dissous dans les ténèbres du vide, une équipe de sauvetage part pour le vaisseau xénos miraculé.
languages.original_text: Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.

traits.locale_text: Une fois la réaction en chaîne terminée et les fragments d'astéroïdes, de débris spatiaux et de mines dissous dans les ténèbres du vide, une équipe de sauvetage part pour le vaisseau xénos miraculé.

languages.text: Patlamalar azalıp asteroit parçaları, uzay enkazları ve uçsuz mayınlarının uçsuzun karanlığında kaybolunca bir kurtarma ekibi, mucizevi bir şekilde sağlam hâldeki zeno gemisine doğru yola çıkıyor.
languages.original_text: Once the explosions quiet down and the shards of asteroids, space debris, and void mines dissolve into the darkness of the void, a rescue team sets off toward the miraculously intact xenoship.
